meta_title: Bandhan Hybrid Equity Fund Direct Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Bandhan Hybrid Equity Fund Direct Growth is Aggressive Hybrid Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 2/10. It has track record of 8 years, with three year return of 15.34. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: Bandhan Hybrid Equity Fund Direct Growth
fund_manager: Anoop Bhaskar, Suyash Choudhary, Anurag Mittal
exit_load: Exit load of 1% if units in excess of 10% are redeemed or switched-out within 12 months.
description: The Fund seeks to generate long term capital appreciation by investing predominantly in equity and equity related instruments. The Fund also seeks to generate current income by investing in debt securities and money market instruments.

analysis.analysis_desc:
Average credit rating of the fund's holdings: AAA 
This fund has holdings of the highest quality
Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y and 5Y

Higher alpha: 2.14 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - CRISIL Hybrid 35+65 Aggressive Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: Bandhan Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: One World Centre, 6th Floor, Tower 1C,Senapati Bapat Marg, Prabhadevi Mumbai 400013
amc_info.description: IDFC Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 13/03/2000 and its managing total assets of â‚¹66,620 Cr. Its ranked at 11 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
IDFC Mutual Fund works under the name IDFC Asset Management Company. The main objective of this mutual fund company is to grow the AUM of the company by offering adequate products for retail, as well as industrial customers.

IDFC is a relatively new fund house, but nevertheless, has won many accolades for its performance, from various agencies.

IDFC mutual fund offers a bunch of mutual fund schemes that have performed relatively well in the market and therefore, this fund house has carved a niche for itself.

It provides funds ranging from equity to debt to hybrid.

This AMC focuses on infrastructure as its key area and its main businesses in Project Finance, Principal Investments, Financial Markets and Investment Banking, Broking, Advisory Services and Asset Management.

IDFC effectively started off its business in 2000 and has since then been catering to investor needs by periodically improving its fund stature, holdings and policies.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.

fund_manager_details.experience: Prior to joining Bandhan Mutual Fund (formerly IDFC Mutual Fund) he has worked with IDBI Mutual Fund, IndiaBulls Mutual Fund, Mata Securities & Twenty First Century.
